tweet: Prepare yourselves for the next #altseason by accumulating quality #altcoins. I'm picking up $ADA #Cardano in the low 500 sats and below

Big shoutout to our pool pioneers joining us today to start building our first #Shelley Haskell testnet for the #Cardano community. So thanks to @adanorthpool @ada_stat @adavibesp @big__pey @Cardanians_io @ChrisGraff @kodexdata 1/3

In preparation to be ready for HTN, we have started  testing the Cardano node. Here is #cardanoland family 5 node network running great!!!. We are ready to be invited for HTN. Impressed with the @InputOutputHK work on Cardano-node so far. @IOHK_Charles  https://t.co/KLU7TZdAIP

Thanks to you all for your support. We’re kicking off with a briefing in a few hours. We'll keep the community updated through the process as we head towards our first public Haskell testnet, so see you back here a little later this week! @Cardano  #ada #Shelley 3/3

Cardano's #PoS employs $ADA coins in the network consensus. Coins' distribution decentralizes the #Cardano #blockchain and there is a higher demand on the market as people desire to ensure passive income. It increases the security budget.  Read more:  https://t.co/CEBHcdVa8N
$ADA is outpacing $BTC on the #Cardano friends & family #Bitcoin halving day! Buy the news and buy the event!
Honored to be a part of the #Shelley Haskell testnet! #Cardano

@SUNNY_stakepool @IOHK_Charles @RichardMcCrackn There is no minimum pledge in Cardano. Pools can always pledge as much as they want, and the more they pledge, the higher the pool rewards - independent of whether their pool is saturated or not. We'll publish a blog on this v soon, so please keep an eye out 👍
